definition: Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine

sentences.english: Rubber trees intercropping with Alpinia villosum was the best to improve soil fertility.
sentences.chinese: 以橡膠間種砂仁對土壤肥力的提高最爲理想。

sentences.english: Grains of Paradise is a spice native to West Africa, in the zingiberaceae family.
sentences.chinese: 砂仁是種源於西非的調味料，屬於姜科。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the extracting process of volatile oil from Amomum villosum etc.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選砂仁複方揮發油提取工藝。

sentences.english: The paper reported the purification and analysis of the Amomum villosum Lour. polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 報道春砂仁多糖的分離純化及結構分析的研究。

sentences.english: Results There was an apparent difference in fingerprint between Amomum villosum and its adulterants.
sentences.chinese: 結果砂仁及其混淆品的HPLC指紋圖譜有明顯差異。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Thai ginger/lesser galangale (Kaempferia galanga)/cyanide (loanword)/same as 氰化
husk of betel nut 檳榔|槟榔[bing1 lang5]
